hero.title: Build the future of web experiences
hero.description: We're looking for talented engineers, designers, and creators who want to push the boundaries of what's possible on the web. Join our remote-first team and ship work that matters.

remoteFirst.title: Remote-first culture
remoteFirst.description: Work from anywhere. We value output over attendance.

growth.title: Growth & learning
growth.description: Annual budget for courses, conferences, and books.

balance.title: Work-life balance
balance.description: Flexible hours and generous vacation policy.

techStack.title: Modern tech stack
techStack.description: Work with cutting-edge tools and technologies.

team.title: Collaborative team
team.description: Small, focused teams shipping impactful work.

openings.title: Open positions
openings.intro: We're actively hiring for these roles. If you don't see a perfect fit, send us your portfolio anyway - we're always looking for exceptional talent.

seniorReact.title: Senior React Developer
seniorReact.description: Build high-performance web applications with React, TypeScript, and Next.js. Lead frontend architecture decisions.

threeDDeveloper.title: 3D Web Developer
threeDDeveloper.description: Create stunning WebGL experiences using Three.js. Optimize performance for immersive web applications.

uiUxDesigner.title: UI/UX Designer
uiUxDesigner.description: Design beautiful, user-centered interfaces. Work closely with engineers to build design systems that scale.

fullstackEngineer.title: Fullstack Engineer
fullstackEngineer.description: Build scalable APIs and cloud infrastructure. Work across the entire stack from database to UI.

motionDesigner.title: Motion Designer
motionDesigner.description: Craft delightful animations and micro-interactions. Bring interfaces to life with purposeful motion.

devopsEngineer.title: DevOps Engineer
devopsEngineer.description: Build reliable CI/CD pipelines and cloud infrastructure. Ensure our deployments are fast and secure.

cta.title: Don't see the right role?
cta.description: We're always open to connecting with talented individuals. Send us your portfolio and let's chat about future opportunities.
